entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 6:31 PM MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. High 16. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 6:31 PM MDT Monday 8 May 2023
